description: This course analyzes the dramatic changes which occurred in Italy after the Second World War. We shall investigate how Mafia and terrorism influenced Italian politics, and how Italians have successfully fought these social plagues. Moreover, the course will examine the most recent political events that have led to major changes in Italian politics and culture. We shall read the following novels: Il Pianeta Azzurro by Luigi Malerba and Petrolio by Pier Paolo Pasolini. We shall also analyze the following films: And the Ship Sails On, Prova d'orchestra by Federico Fellini and Caro Diario by Nanni Moretti.
name: LINGUA DELLA TELEVISIONE
